name: Legend of Kassappa
description:
Snookers Dungeon Crawler, sounds fun right? TLOK is a Dungeon Crawler themed Snooker game where the player needs to pocket the Heroes to proceed to the next levels. As in common Dungeon Crawler games each level is full of enemies, traps and loot. Also, each Hero have different habilities and they can be upgraded, or die.

Created by Hugo Vaz, Mariana Bergo, Otavio Soato, Saulo Camarotti e Thiago Marten, for the Global Game Jam 2018.
